Settings.Name: Enable Debug Spells
Settings.Description: Add debug spells to AI Allies: Extra Spells.

Settings.Name: Enable Custom Archetypes
Settings.Description: Give custom archetype spells.

Settings.Name: Enable Mindcontrol Art
Settings.Description: Give Mindcontrol spells.

Settings.Name: Give Swarm Spells
Settings.Description: Give the Swarm Group spells. WARNING: Swarm AI is VERY limited.

Settings.Name: Enable Focus/Ignore Bonus Action Cost
Settings.Description: Makes Focus/Ignore spells cost a bonus action and slightly changes mechanics.

Settings.Name: Disable Allies Dashing
Settings.Description: Disable dashing for all allies.

Settings.Name: Disable Allies Throwing
Settings.Description: Disable throwing for all allies.

Settings.Name: Enable Dynamic Spellblock
Settings.Description: Block spell usage depending on the character's health percentage.

Settings.Name: Enable Dynamic Archetype Switching
Settings.Description: AI changes archetype based on combat situation (e.g., emergency healer mode when ally is downed, defensive behavior at low HP).

Settings.Name: Target Priority Strategy
Settings.Description: How AI allies choose which enemies to attack.

Settings.Name: Enable Focus Fire
Settings.Description: AI allies coordinate to attack the same target when possible.

Settings.Name: Enable Combat Formations
Settings.Description: Automatically position allies in tactical formations at combat start.

Settings.Name: Formation Type
Settings.Description: Which formation pattern to use for ally positioning.

Settings.Name: Formation Spacing
Settings.Description: Distance between allies in formation (meters).

Settings.Name: Enable AI Item Usage
Settings.Description: Allow AI allies to use healing potions, scrolls, and consumables automatically.

Settings.Name: Healing Potion Threshold
Settings.Description: HP percentage below which AI will use healing potions (%).

Settings.Name: Enable Scroll Usage
Settings.Description: Allow AI to use scrolls when out of spell slots or for key spells.

Settings.Name: Enable Buff Potion Usage
Settings.Description: Allow AI to use buff potions (Haste, Strength, etc.) before combat.

Settings.Name: Low HP Threshold
Settings.Description: HP percentage below which allies prioritize survival and healing (%).

Settings.Name: Berserker Mode for Raging Characters
Settings.Description: Barbarians use aggressive berserker behavior while raging.

Settings.Name: Beast AI for Wild Shape
Settings.Description: Druids use beast-like combat patterns while in Wild Shape.

Settings.Name: Spell Slot Conservation
Settings.Description: How aggressively casters use high-level spell slots.

Settings.Name: Healing Priority
Settings.Description: How healers choose who to heal.

Settings.Name: Melee Flanking
Settings.Description: Melee allies attempt to flank enemies for advantage.

Settings.Name: Ranged High Ground
Settings.Description: Ranged allies prefer elevated positions.

Settings.Name: Debug Archetype Changes
Settings.Description: Log archetype changes to console for debugging.
